instructions.command_all:
RUN adduser -D -u 1000 node && \
	apk add --no-cache         libstdc++ && \
	apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps         binutils-gold         curl         g++         gcc         gnupg         libgcc         linux-headers         make         python && \
	for key in     9554F04D7259F04124DE6B476D5A82AC7E37093B     94AE36675C464D64BAFA68DD7434390BDBE9B9C5     0034A06D9D9B0064CE8ADF6BF1747F4AD2306D93     FD3A5288F042B6850C66B31F09FE44734EB7990E     71DCFD284A79C3B38668286BC97EC7A07EDE3FC1     DD8F2338BAE7501E3DD5AC78C273792F7D83545D     B9AE9905FFD7803F25714661B63B535A4C206CA9     C4F0DFFF4E8C1A8236409D08E73BC641CC11F4C8     56730D5401028683275BD23C23EFEFE93C4CFFFE   ; do     gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key";   done && \
	curl -SLO "https://nodejs.org/dist/v$NODE_VERSION/node-v$NODE_VERSION.tar.xz" && \
	curl -SLO "https://nodejs.org/dist/v$NODE_VERSION/SHASUMS256.txt.asc" && \
	gpg --batch --decrypt --output SHASUMS256.txt SHASUMS256.txt.asc && \
	grep " node-v$NODE_VERSION.tar.xz\$" SHASUMS256.txt | sha256sum -c - && \
	tar -xf "node-v$NODE_VERSION.tar.xz" && \
	cd "node-v$NODE_VERSION" && \
	./configure && \
	make -j$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN) && \
	make install && \
	apk del .build-deps && \
	cd .. && \
	rm -Rf "node-v$NODE_VERSION" && \
	rm "node-v$NODE_VERSION.tar.xz" SHASUMS256.txt.asc SHASUMS256.txt
system_commands: apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps         binutils-gold         curl         g++         gcc         gnupg         libgcc         linux-headers         make         python

for key in     9554F04D7259F04124DE6B476D5A82AC7E37093B     94AE36675C464D64BAFA68DD7434390BDBE9B9C5     0034A06D9D9B0064CE8ADF6BF1747F4AD2306D93     FD3A5288F042B6850C66B31F09FE44734EB7990E     71DCFD284A79C3B38668286BC97EC7A07EDE3FC1     DD8F2338BAE7501E3DD5AC78C273792F7D83545D     B9AE9905FFD7803F25714661B63B535A4C206CA9     C4F0DFFF4E8C1A8236409D08E73BC641CC11F4C8     56730D5401028683275BD23C23EFEFE93C4CFFFE   ; do     gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key";   done

instructions.command_all:
RUN apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps-yarn curl gnupg && \
	for key in     6A010C5166006599AA17F08146C2130DFD2497F5   ; do     gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key";   done && \
	curl -fSL -o yarn.js "https://yarnpkg.com/downloads/$YARN_VERSION/yarn-legacy-$YARN_VERSION.js" && \
	curl -fSL -o yarn.js.asc "https://yarnpkg.com/downloads/$YARN_VERSION/yarn-legacy-$YARN_VERSION.js.asc" && \
	gpg --batch --verify yarn.js.asc yarn.js && \
	rm yarn.js.asc && \
	mv yarn.js /usr/local/bin/yarn && \
	chmod +x /usr/local/bin/yarn && \
	apk del .build-deps-yarn
system_commands: for key in     6A010C5166006599AA17F08146C2130DFD2497F5   ; do     gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key";   done

instructions.command_all:
RUN addgroup mygroup && \
	adduser -D -G mygroup myuser && \
	mkdir -p /usr/src/app && \
	chown -R myuser /usr/src/app

change_instruction.all:
RUN adduser -D -u 1000 node && \
	apk add --no-cache         libstdc++ && \
	apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps         binutils-gold         curl         g++         gcc         gnupg         libgcc         linux-headers         make         python && \
	for key in     9554F04D7259F04124DE6B476D5A82AC7E37093B     94AE36675C464D64BAFA68DD7434390BDBE9B9C5     0034A06D9D9B0064CE8ADF6BF1747F4AD2306D93     FD3A5288F042B6850C66B31F09FE44734EB7990E     71DCFD284A79C3B38668286BC97EC7A07EDE3FC1     DD8F2338BAE7501E3DD5AC78C273792F7D83545D     B9AE9905FFD7803F25714661B63B535A4C206CA9     C4F0DFFF4E8C1A8236409D08E73BC641CC11F4C8     56730D5401028683275BD23C23EFEFE93C4CFFFE   ; do     gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key";   done && \
	curl -SLO "https://nodejs.org/dist/v$NODE_VERSION/node-v$NODE_VERSION.tar.xz" && \
	curl -SLO "https://nodejs.org/dist/v$NODE_VERSION/SHASUMS256.txt.asc" && \
	gpg --batch --decrypt --output SHASUMS256.txt SHASUMS256.txt.asc && \
	grep " node-v$NODE_VERSION.tar.xz\$" SHASUMS256.txt | sha256sum -c - && \
	tar -xf "node-v$NODE_VERSION.tar.xz" && \
	cd "node-v$NODE_VERSION" && \
	./configure && \
	make -j$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN) && \
	make install && \
	apk del .build-deps && \
	cd .. && \
	rm -Rf "node-v$NODE_VERSION" && \
	rm "node-v$NODE_VERSION.tar.xz" SHASUMS256.txt.asc SHASUMS256.txt

RUN apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps-yarn curl gnupg && \
	for key in     6A010C5166006599AA17F08146C2130DFD2497F5   ; do     gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key";   done && \
	curl -fSL -o yarn.js "https://yarnpkg.com/downloads/$YARN_VERSION/yarn-legacy-$YARN_VERSION.js" && \
	curl -fSL -o yarn.js.asc "https://yarnpkg.com/downloads/$YARN_VERSION/yarn-legacy-$YARN_VERSION.js.asc" && \
	gpg --batch --verify yarn.js.asc yarn.js && \
	rm yarn.js.asc && \
	mv yarn.js /usr/local/bin/yarn && \
	chmod +x /usr/local/bin/yarn && \
	apk del .build-deps-yarn

RUN addgroup mygroup && \
	adduser -D -G mygroup myuser && \
	mkdir -p /usr/src/app && \
	chown -R myuser /usr/src/app
